page.title: 08EDUCTN SCHOOL MEALS SERVICE
page.content: The number of pupils who had school dinners on the 4th of July,1985 were 91,19 had sandwiches and 10 went home for dinner. MENU ==== MON.- Fish fingers, chips,peas;ice cream TUE.- Boiled ham,beetroot,potatoes; chocolate sponge. WEDS.- Mincebeef,cabbage,potatoes; jelly & ice cream. THURS.-Stewed meat,carrots,potatoes, lemon tart. FRI.- Fish cake,peas,chips;jam tart & custard. ---------------------- Meat came from Roberts & Co.Portdinorwig.Fruit & veg. from Parry & Co.,Pwllheli,Milk from North'n Dairies,Penrhyndeudraeth.Groceries from Morris & Jones,Welshpool.
